label: dog
caption: A man in his mid-30s, dressed in casual outdoor clothing, is chasing after his energetic brown dog as it frolics through the lush green grass of a backyard on a sunny afternoon. The dog's bright red vest catches the eye, while its tail wags excitedly as it dashes around a small oak tree. Meanwhile, the man laughs and tries to keep up with his lively pet, who seems to be enjoying the freedom of being outside on this lovely day.
